pr_title: Add a stub for NativeMethodHandle in JDK16

timeline.bodyText:
All uses of OpenJDKCompileStubThrowError() should be in a throw statement:
  throw OpenJDKCompileStub.OpenJDKCompileStubThrowError();
timeline.author: keithc-ca

timeline.bodyText:
This should repeat the condition:
/*[ELSE] Panama */
timeline.author: keithc-ca

timeline.bodyText:
Please use spaces around binary operators, just like you would in C code:
/*[INCLUDE-IF Panama | (JAVA_SPEC_VERSION >= 16)]*/
timeline.author: keithc-ca

timeline.message:
Add a stub for NativeMethodHandle in JDK16

fixes: https://github.com/eclipse/openj9/issues/11255

Signed-off-by: Babneet Singh <sbabneet@ca.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: This won't compile: the return here (and in addRelatedMHs()) is unreachable.
timeline.author: keithc-ca
